name: There is no Aim
description:
A small game I started working on a while back. The original version was made in under 6 hours, and I decided to remake it here.

There is no Aim is a fast-paced, very difficult shooter game. The controls are simple: use WASD to move and Space to shoot. The farther you get, the more difficult it becomes. Good luck.

Changelog:

--- UPDATE 1.0.1 ---

This was mainly a bugfix patch.

  • Fixed an issue with charged shots, where size of an enemy would not match hp
  • Fixed an issue with game height not scaling with window height
  • Fixed an issue with score not automatically increasing over time
  • Fixed an issue where some people experienced a 33% deduction in game speed
  • Fixed an issue where selecting blank options in the settings menu was possible
  • Fixed an issue where leaving the game paused for long periods of time increased spawn rates and game difficulty
  • Fixed an issue where enemy hp could go into the negatives
  • Fixed an issue with particles not moving correctly
  • Decreased unnecessary particle visibility
  • Added a temporary high score which is displayed at the end of each round
    • High scores are currently not preserved after exiting the game
